## createAgent() function

Helper function to create a new instance of the [Agent](./daf-core.agent.md) class with correct type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createAgent<T extends IPluginMethodMap>(options: IAgentOptions): TAgent<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [IAgentOptions](./daf-core.iagentoptions.md) | Agent configuration options |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TAgent](./daf-core.tagent.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

configured agent

## Remarks

Use [TAgent](./daf-core.tagent.md) to configure agent type (list of available methods) for autocomplete in IDE

## Example


```typescript
import { createAgent, IResolveDid, IMessageHandler } from 'daf-core'
import { AgentRestClient } from 'daf-rest'
import { CredentialIssuer, ICredentialIssuer } from 'daf-w3c'
const agent = createAgent<IResolveDid & IMessageHandler & ICredentialIssuer>({
  plugins: [
    new CredentialIssuer(),
    new AgentRestClient({
      url: 'http://localhost:3002/agent',
      enabledMethods: [
        'resolveDid',
        'handleMessage',
      ],
    }),
  ],
})

```
